resources.string:
Terms and Conditions

Welcome to Organizer Class App! By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

1. Acceptance of Terms
By accessing or using the Organizer Class App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms.

2. Usage of the App
- You may use this app for personal and educational purposes only.
- Any misuse of the app for unlawful purposes is strictly prohibited.

3. User Accounts
- Users must provide accurate and truthful information when creating an account.
- You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials.

4. Content Ownership
- All content, including class schedules, assignments, and other materials, remains the intellectual property of Organizer Class App or its contributors.
- Users may not reproduce, distribute, or modify content without prior permission.

5. Privacy Policy
We respect your privacy. Any personal information collected will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

6. Limitation of Liability
- The app is provided "as is." We make no guarantees regarding the availability, accuracy, or reliability of the app.
- We are not responsible for any loss or damage caused by the use of this app.

7. Termination
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate access to the app for any user who violates these terms.

8. Modifications to Terms
Organizer Class App reserves the right to update these terms at any time. Continued use of the app constitutes agreement to the revised terms.

For questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us at organizerclasses@gmail.com.

Effective Date: 1 December 2024

1. Non-Refundable Items
- Fully accessed or downloaded courses.
- Purchases made under promotional offers.

2. Cancellation Terms
- Subscriptions cannot be canceled once activated.
- Cancellations are allowed for one-time purchases before accessing course materials.

3. Refund Process
- Submit refund requests via organizerclasses@gmail.com with your transaction ID and reason.
- Refunds will be initiated within 2 working days and credited within 5-7 working days.

Contact: For refund-related queries, email us at organizerclasses@gmail.com.

Effective Date: 1 December 2024

1. Information Collection
- We collect personal information, including your name, email ID, and payment details, during registration or purchase.
- Usage data, such as access logs and activity, is also collected to improve the Appâ€™s functionality.

2. Use of Information
- To provide and enhance App services.
- To process payments and manage subscriptions.
- To communicate updates and offers.

3. Data Protection
- We implement robust security measures to safeguard your information.
- Despite these measures, no system is entirely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute protection.

4. Sharing Information
- Information is not sold or shared with third parties, except service providers essential for App operations (e.g., payment processors).

5. User Rights
- You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data by contacting support@organizerclasses.com.

6. Cookies
- The App uses cookies to enhance user experience. Cookies can be disabled in browser settings.

7. Policy Updates
Changes to this policy will be communicated through the App or via email.

Contact: For privacy concerns, contact us at organizerclasses@gmail.com.

Effective Date: 1 December 2024
